padding: 10px; max-width: 80%; margin: 0 auto; display: block;

td.p:
Thanks for applying for
Respected Job Name
at Aspire.

p.t: We glad to inform you that, your profile has been shortlisted for the interview process. You would require to come down for a personal interview at our office.
We glad to inform you that, your profile has been shortlisted for the interview process. You would require to come down for a personal interview at our office.
We glad to inform you that, your profile has been shortlisted for the interview process. So please be ready for an interview on given time.
We glad to inform you that, your profile has been shortlisted for the interview process. So please be ready for an interview on given time.

a.style: margin: 0 0 5px 0; font-weight: normal; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; color: #2ba6cb;

t.p: You are requested to bring your updated resume and one passport size photo along with you for the interview.

td.p: Please confirm your presence by responding to this email or contact me to reschedule the interview in case the above time does not suit you. You can find my contact details in my signature.
We look forward to seeing you.

td.p: Thank you for showing interest in our company and sharing your application. After your interview(s) at our organization, we reached on a feedback that your candidature does not match with our needs. Should there be in matching requirement in the future, we will be happy to contact you.

td.p: We thank you for your interest in our company and for your application, Unfortunately you are failed to turn up for interview because of any reason at our organization, we are sorry to inform you that you are not qualify to appear in interview.
Note: In future if you want to appear for interview contact on below mention contact.

td.p: We thank you for your interest in our company and for your application. Unfortunately you didnt reach to the passing marks in test you appeared in our organization. Sorry to inform you that you are not eligible to appear for interview at our organization.
Note: You will be eligible for interview again at our organization after 6 months.

record.field: Application refused - Not matching with requirement
